description: SurveyMonkey is an online survey development platform that enables users to create, distribute, and analyze surveys for various purposes.

tools.name: SURVEY_MONKEY_CREATE_SURVEY
tools.description: Tool to create a new survey. Use when you have a survey title and need an ID for follow-up operations. Example: "Create a survey titled 'Customer Satisfaction'"

inputSchema.title: CreateSurveyRequest

footer.title: Footer
footer.description: Whether to display SurveyMonkey's footer in the survey.

inputSchema.description: Request model for creating a new survey.

tools.name: SURVEY_MONKEY_DELETE_SURVEY
tools.description: Tool to delete a specific survey. Use when the survey ID is confirmed correct. Deletion is irreversible. Example prompt: "Delete survey '123456789'."

inputSchema.title: DeleteSurveyRequest

survey_id.title: Survey Id
survey_id.description: The unique identifier of the survey to be deleted.

inputSchema.description: Request model for deleting a survey.

tools.name: SURVEY_MONKEY_GET_COLLECTORS
tools.description: Tool to retrieve a list of collectors for a specific survey. Use when you need collector URLs, counts, and statuses.

inputSchema.title: GetCollectorsRequest

name.title: Name
name.description: Partial match filter on collector name

include.title: Include
include.description: Additional fields to include per collector

end_date.title: End Date
end_date.description: Filter collectors created before this datetime (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS)

survey_id.title: Survey Id
survey_id.description: Survey ID to retrieve collectors for

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: Filter collectors created after this datetime (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS)

inputSchema.description:
Request schema for GET_COLLECTORS:
- survey_id: ID of the survey to list collectors for (path parameter).
- page/per_page: pagination controls.
- sort_by/sort_order: how to sort the returned collectors.
- name: filter by collector name (partial match).
- start_date/end_date: ISO datetimes to filter by creation date.
- include: extra fields to include per collector.

tools.name: SURVEY_MONKEY_GET_CONTACTS
tools.description: Tool to retrieve a list of contacts. Use after authenticating with SurveyMonkey. Call this to fetch all contacts associated with your account.

inputSchema.title: GetContactsRequest
inputSchema.description: Request schema for retrieving contacts. No parameters are required.

tools.name: SURVEY_MONKEY_GET_GROUPS
tools.description: Tool to retrieve a list of groups. Use after authentication when you need to enumerate or paginate through all groups in your SurveyMonkey account.

include.title: Include
include.description: Comma-separated list of additional fields to include in each group object, e.g., 'member_count'.

per_page.title: Per Page
per_page.description: Number of groups to return per page.

tools.name: SURVEY_MONKEY_GET_RESPONSES
tools.description: Tool to retrieve a list of responses for a specific survey. Use when you need to browse or filter responses after confirming the survey ID.

custom.title: Custom
custom.description: Filter responses by custom value associated with the response

last_name.title: Last Name
last_name.description: Filter responses by recipient's last name

survey_id.title: Survey Id
survey_id.description: The unique identifier of the survey.

first_name.title: First Name
first_name.description: Filter responses by recipient's first name

end_created_at.title: End Created At
end_created_at.description: Filter responses created before this datetime (ISO 8601)

total_time_max.title: Total Time Max
total_time_max.description: Filter responses with total time less than or equal to this value (in seconds)

total_time_min.title: Total Time Min
total_time_min.description: Filter responses with total time greater than or equal to this value (in seconds)

end_modified_at.title: End Modified At
end_modified_at.description: Filter responses modified before this datetime (ISO 8601)

custom_variables.title: Custom Variables
custom_variables.description: Filter responses by custom variables as key:value pairs

start_created_at.title: Start Created At
start_created_at.description: Filter responses created after this datetime (ISO 8601)

start_modified_at.title: Start Modified At
start_modified_at.description: Filter responses modified after this datetime (ISO 8601)

tools.name: SURVEY_MONKEY_GET_SURVEY_DETAILS
tools.description: Tool to retrieve metadata and counts for a specific survey. Use after confirming the survey ID.

inputSchema.title: GetSurveyDetailsRequest

survey_id.title: Survey Id
survey_id.description: The unique identifier of the survey to fetch details for.

inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving details of a single survey.

tools.name: SURVEY_MONKEY_GET_SURVEYS
tools.description: Tool to retrieve a list of surveys. Use when you need to enumerate or paginate through all surveys.

page.title: Page
page.description: Page of resources to return (1-based index)

include.title: Include
include.description: Additional fields to include per survey

per_page.title: Per Page
per_page.description: Number of resources to return per page (max=100)
